title: Is this for Sem 1 or what ?

comments.body:
YES, looking at your course code ,"A" at the end tells that its for the first sem.  
You can  write backlogs during summer (May 2025) in this case.  
All the Best, study well, make sure to pass it before sem 6.
We received a circular saying summer backlog registration open in June and it’s in July so may isn’t summer exam right

May is usually the ESA exam season , where you will write your semester ESA + backlogs if any.  
You have gotten a circular saying its in july and registration will be open in june likely because your semester started late. pesu does makes sure sem 3 onwards there wont be any delays of semester terms and 3rd sem , 5th sem and 7th sem folks start the semster on the same day.
